news.title: UK steelmakers call Trump doubling tariffs 'another body blow'
news.summary: Donald Trump says he will double tariffs on steel and aluminium imports to 50% from Wednesday.

news.title: Will Starmer's military review match the threats we're told we face?
news.summary: BBC's Laura Kuenssberg examines what we can expect from the strategic defence review - and its potential pitfalls.

news.title: Sharon Horgan says she only found confidence after Bad Sisters series two
news.summary: The TV star, who is also behind hits like Motherland, said she finally feels she "belongs in the room."

news.title: Body found in search for girl missing in Thames
news.summary: A body has been found in the search for a girl missing in the River Thames, police say.

news.title: Desperate Housewives star Valerie Mahaffey dies aged 71
news.summary: The star died in California on Friday after being diagnosed with cancer, her publicist says.

news.title: How Bondi mass killer slipped through the cracks in Australia
news.summary: An inquest is examining whether there were "missed opportunities" to stop Joel Cauchi's stabbing rampage.

news.title: How controversial US-Israeli backed Gaza aid plan turned to chaos
news.summary: Touted as a vital lifeline for Gazans facing  starvation, the first week of the new plan has been beset by chaos.

news.title: Astronauts in space for nine months didn't know if they would 'be able to make it back'
news.summary: Nasa pair Butch and Suni tell the BBC they feared being unable to get home when they failed to dock on the ISS.

news.title: Iran significantly growing uranium stockpile, warns UN nuclear agency
news.summary: The International Atomic Energy Agency says Iran now possesses over 400kg of uranium at 60% purity.

news.title: Gaza aid trucks rushed by desperate and hungry crowds, WFP says
news.summary: "Starving people will not let a food truck pass. They need to feed their families", the World Food Programme said.
